Spring MVC JSP Detail View

Descripción

Create a JSP detail view to display one item


File Template: ✅


Prefix

jsp:detail


Scopes

jsp


Snippet de código

<%@ taglib uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" prefix="c" %>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
	<title>${1:Detalle}</title>
</head>
<body>
	<h1>Detalle de item</h1>
	<p>ID: ${item.id}</p>
	<p>Name: ${item.name}</p>
	<a href="../">Volver a la lista</a>
</body>
</html>
